high_descs: Turn to the right and walk to the middle of the console table under the television.
Pick up the newspaper from the bottom shelf of the console table.
Turn around to the right and walk to the end table beside the couch.
Turn on the lamp on the end table.
anns.task_desc: Turn on a lamp while holding a newspaper.

high_descs: Turn right, hang a left around the edge of the wooden television stand and turn left to face the television.
Pick up the newspaper from the bottom shelf of the wooden stand to the right of the blue card.
Turn right, walk to the wall and hang a right to reach a small wooden table.
Turn on the small lamp on the left side of the table.
anns.task_desc: Examine a newspaper by the light of a small lamp.

high_descs: Head straight and stop at the large brown table
Grab the newspaper off of the shelf on the table
Turn around and go to the end table with the lamp on it
anns.task_desc: Turning on the lamp while holding a newspaper
